legal.title: Legal
legal.privacyIntro: Relay is designed to protect your privacy. This policy explains what we collect, what we don't, and why.
legal.privacyWhatWeCollectDesc: For group coordinators: an email address for authentication and a group name for directory listing. For individuals seeking help: nothing. No email, no phone, no name, no account.
legal.privacyWhatWeDontCollectDesc: We do not collect IP addresses, browser fingerprints, cookies, or analytics data on anonymous routes. We do not track who visits the site or who creates a mailbox.
legal.privacyEncryptionDesc: Messages between individuals and groups are encrypted end-to-end using libsodium. Relay cannot read these messages. Your private key is derived from your passphrase on your device and is never transmitted to our servers.
legal.privacyDataRetentionDesc: Anonymous mailboxes are automatically deleted after 7 days of inactivity. We do not archive or back up individual mailbox data beyond this window.
legal.privacySubpoenaDesc: If compelled by law to produce data, Relay can only provide encrypted blobs it cannot decrypt. We have no plaintext messages, no individual identities, and no browsing records for anonymous users.
legal.termsIntro: By using Relay, you agree to the following terms.
legal.termsWhatRelayIsDesc: Relay is a coordination tool connecting mutual aid groups with fund hubs. It is not a benefits platform, a case management system, or a guaranteed source of funding.
legal.termsNoGuaranteesDesc: Relay does not guarantee that groups will respond to help requests or that funding will be provided. Groups operate independently and make their own decisions.
legal.termsPassphraseResponsibilityDesc: Your passphrase is the only way to access your mailbox. Relay cannot recover or reset passphrases. If you lose your passphrase, your mailbox and its messages are permanently inaccessible.
legal.termsGroupIndependenceDesc: Mutual aid groups listed on Relay are independent organizations. Relay does not control, endorse, or assume responsibility for their actions, decisions, or fund distribution.
legal.termsAcceptableUseDesc: Do not abuse the anonymous mailbox system. Do not submit fraudulent help requests, spam groups with messages, or use the platform for purposes other than mutual aid coordination.
